content: @James Agnew How would I prepopulate JPA Server with some SearchParameter resources in a branch so that if people deployed code from my branch of JPA Server, they'd have the necessary SearchParameter resources to support the Saner Project?

I think what @Martin Zacho Grønhøj is doing here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179167-hapi/topic/Upload.20of.20IG/near/195259604 is something which would help in your use-case a lot. (Priming the Server with an IG package at startup)

@Keith Boone what Martin is doing is prepping the HAPI FHIR server with the option to parameterized IG upload at start time. @Patrick Werner did your student start on the prepping work of IG submission using the client? I bet that the unfolding of the IG could be borrowed from the code @Martin Zacho Grønhøj is doing (which in turn probably wraps @Grahame Grieve code)

@Keith Boone the code will reside across the HAPI FHIR framework as well as the HAPI FHIR Starter, I believe (heads up, @Sean McIlvenna )

@Jens Villadsen yes. But in another context, he built his own cli. Will point him to @Martin Zacho Grønhøj s work. (Hope he can start soon, we are currently occupied by preparing the next release of our virtual Tumorboard software and some covid19 related projects).
